definition: to spin (cotton or hemp etc)/fine woven silk fabric
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
to spin synthetic fiber/to spin silk/spinning/filature

sentences.english: The wicking behavior of compact and ring spun yarns and knitted fabrics made from them is assessed.
sentences.chinese: 评价了集聚纺和环锭纺细纱及其织物的芯吸性能。

sentences.english: In the present study, electrospun fibers are applied to sound absorption.
sentences.chinese: 本论文将静电纺纤维应用于噪声吸收。

sentences.english: Apart from cooking, mother did farming, planted vegetables, fed pigs, raised silkworms and spun cotton into yarn.
sentences.chinese: 母亲把饭煮了，还要种田种菜，喂猪养蚕，纺棉花。

sentences.english: The overhead cleaner, core spinning for Spandex and stubby yarn spinning devices are options for customers to choose.
sentences.chinese: 吹吸风装置，纺氨纶包芯纱及竹节纱装置由用户选用。

sentences.english: The international monofilament horizontal spinning and vertical spinning technologies were introduced in details.
sentences.chinese: 详述了国外立式纺和卧式纺单丝技术。

sentences.english: Vortex spinning process is suitable for spinning pure cotton yarn.
sentences.chinese: 涡流纺纱机适合纺纯棉纱。

sentences.english: Pure cotton yarn of polyester cotton textile mills began to spin, and other blended.
sentences.chinese: 一些纺纯棉纱的纺织厂开始转纺涤棉等其他混纺。

sentences.english: More to the point, all your money-spinning ideas come from your thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 更重要的一点是，所有的钱你纺意念来自你的想法。
这部机器是纺尼龙丝的。

sentences.english: They grazing people are spinning wool line to kill time.
sentences.chinese: 他们在放牧的时候纺羊毛线打发时间。

sentences.english: Specializing in the production of spun-bonded non-woven polypropylene.
sentences.chinese: 专业生产聚丙烯纺粘无纺布。

sentences.english: An important application of electrospinning nanofiber mats is filtration.
sentences.chinese: 静电纺纳米纤维毡的一个重要应用是过滤。

sentences.english: This paper describes the experience of the controlling the count in mule spinning when producing woolen cashmere knitting yarn.
sentences.chinese: 本文阐述了走锭纺粗纺羊绒针织纱的支数控制经验。

definition: generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton
